reviewtext: I love this lens for my Canon 50D.  I bought it to replace a Tamron 70-300mm.  It was a good lens but it started giving me error readings on my camera. Since I have been using the Canon 75-300 I have not gotten any messages.  Good quality and reasonable price.
summary: Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6III Telephoto Zoom lens
